page.title: 13WORKERS AT THE CASTLE
page.content: The most important job is the forestry.There are at least twenty people involved in forestry.The gardens are kept in order by Mr.Ward,Mr.Palmer and Mr.Peeling.Mr. Peeling is the head gardener.The gardeners look after the roses,the kitchen gardens,the grass and the banks on either side of the exit which is called the Jubilee.Foresters use chain-saws to cut down the trees and they use tractors to pull the tree trunks away.They use a landrover for driving around the park to see that everything is in order.Mr.Grimes is the agent and Mr.Steel is the headforester.There are secretaries and clerks and surveyors in the office that work all day every day apart from Sunday and Bank Holidays.But they do work over Christmas and Easter.Some ladies go to clean the Castle.
